title.narrative: Pro-resilience Hunger Solutions for Women and Children in Conflict Area of Pibor

description.narrative: The project will create 15 female vegetable farming groups (each 25 members) following a targeting exercise (through community committees), each group to involve members of multiple ethnic; distribution of 375 vegetable seeds, fruit tree seedlings and tools kits to female vegetable groups; digging of 15 shallow wells for vegetable gardens irrigation through Food for Assets (FFA) and practical training for each of the 15 female vegetable groups through Field Farmer schools among other activities.
